tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Other Stages

definition.text: These are the last few trades in the period tested, and all three of them are clear fails.

paragraphs.text: Time to check the context in the 24H time frame!
To me, it looks unclear whether the context is suitable for a swing short or not!
So, what do we make of this first test? Let's compare the results with the hypothesis' predictions.
